thread.title: WATCH: Mother Of Child Murdered By An Illegal Immigrant Asks Pelosi Which Of Her Grandkids She Thinks Is Expendable
thread.title_full: WATCH: Mother Of Child Murdered By An Illegal Immigrant Asks Pelosi Which Of Her Grandkids She Thinks Is Expendable

author: Christine Rousselle
title: WATCH: Mother Of Child Murdered By An Illegal Immigrant Asks Pelosi Which Of Her Grandkids She Thinks Is Expendable
text:
Share Tweet 
Laura Wilkerson's son Joshua was brutally tortured and murdered in 2010 by an illegal immigrant who was brought to the United States as a child. 
At the CNN Town Hall Wlkerson confronted Rep. Nancy Pelosi (R-CA) about her support for sanctuary cities, and asked Pelosi which of her grandchildren she views as expendable enough to be murdered by someone who isn't legally in the country. 
Watch the exchange here: 
While Pelosi did express sympathy to Mrs. Wilkerson over the murder of her child, she also attempted to fact-check her to see if she lived in a sanctuary city. The Wilkersons lived near Houston, which was a sanctuary city, but did not live in Houston proper. She also then tried to say that most people in this country illegally are not in fact breaking the law. 
Except...that their entire presence in the country is against the law.
